The opposition that calls for the proposal to be withdrawn is indifferent to when the debt debate will be held, how will the country re-launch

Brothers and sisters .. After consultation with my brother Mohammed bin Zayed .. And the adoption of the President of the State, may God protect him .. We announce, thank God for the new ministerial formation
The formation of the new is a new stage, the title of the future .. Youth .. and happiness .. And the development of education .. And dealing with climate change to protect our environment
Sister Lobna bint Khalid Al Qasimi was appointed Minister of State for Tolerance. She wished that she could play a regional and not just local role in this field

Najla Mohammed Al Awar, Minister of Community Development, Sister Najla, mother of 3 children, former Secretary-General of the Council of Ministers and part of my team was appointed https://t.co/Gxjhabmt3E
Dr. Thani Al-Zewaidi, Minister of Climate Change and the Environment in the 32nd year has a PhD in Renewable Energy and our representative in Irina https://t.co/QjRL38NFOU
Mohammed Al-Bawardi Minister of State for Defense Affairs .. Muhammad is a place of trust and record of achievements in the service of the country and protect its gains https://t.co/z064TNjqp6
Jamila Salem Al-Muhairi, Minister of State for Public Education, has 20 years of experience in education and has a task that needs to be more than the previous one https://t.co/5BtHMUl3h8

Dr. Ahmed Bahloul .. Minister of State for Higher Education Affairs .. Ahmed is the source of the head and the work of a professor at the University of Khalifa .. and expect him a lot https://t.co/W4NkCqo43I

The Ministry of Education has three ministers, an institution that runs its schools, a Higher Education Council that supervises it, and we follow it from the Council of Ministers. There is no excuse for anyone after that.

Oud Al-Roumi has been appointed Minister of State for happiness .. Covenants of the Director General of the Office of the Prime Minister .. will remain with me to follow up the subject myself https://t.co/I3as7TW1zm
Happiness in our country is not a security .. There will be plans, projects, programs and indicators .. It will be part of the work of all our ministries .. And part of our way of life

Noura al-Kaabi was appointed Minister of State for National Council Affairs. Nora was a member of the Council and would be the best to upgrade his relationship with the government. Https://t.co/KpLOAmiHfS
Shama Al Mazroui .. Secretary of State for Youth Affairs .. Shema 22 years old .. She has a Master of Oxford .. and Balakloris of New York University https://t.co/QkYoptoXxV
The new economic action plan consists of two parts: immediate measures and a long-term strategy https://t.co/99wDwVcYk1

Shamma will also be the president of the Youth Council, which will represent the aspirations and issues of young people in the government .. We will give them powers and expect them and the Council has real achievements
This is the full formation of the Government of the twelfth UAE .. It is our team to achieve the aspirations of our people .. And what is my compromise except God https://t.co/WaGdckX4tJ

My thanks and appreciation to Brother Hamdan bin Mubarak and Sister Maryam Al Roumi .. Their work is well preserved .. Their history is well known ... and the need for them will continue to serve their country.
I also thank Abdullah Ghabash for his efforts in the government during the past two years and wish him success
Very proud to lend my support as the new Patron of @Camfed to the advancement of girls' education-JG https://t.co/0MrckyJk9X
After discussion with my brother Mohammed bin Zayed and the approval of the President, we are heby announce the new UAE cabinet
The new cabinet focuses on the future, youth, happiness, developing education, and combating climate change
We have appointed Lubna bint Khaled al Qasimi as Minister of State for Tolerance. We hope she will play both a local and regional role.
Najla Al Awar as Minister of Community Development. Mother of 3, Najla was Secretary General of the Cabinet https://t.co/IBO1flQ7Ij
Dr. Thani Al-Zeyoudi as Minister of Climate Change & Environment. At 32, with a PhD in renewable energy https://t.co/CygO1wLcqJ
Mohammed Al Bowardi as Minister of State for Defense Affairs, with a track record full of achievements https://t.co/l7jbietwaMa
Jameela Salem Al Muhairi as Minister of State for General Education, with 20 years of experience in education https://t.co/yZQqaYC5K9

Ministry of education has 3 ministers, and an institution to manage its schools. It will report to a higher council for education
"We have done our utmost to allow 650 new jobs to be created here in Mons." #IKEAMons
Ohood Al Roumi as Minister of State for Happiness. She remains responsible as DG of the Prime Minister's Office. https://t.co/1Omrzc9b8F
National happiness is not a wish. Plans, projects, programs, criteria will inform the work of our ministries to achieve happiness
Noura Al Kaabi as Minister of State for Federal National Council Affairs. We trust she will add great value. https://t.co/3u4G5ugH6E
Shamma AlMazrui as Minister of State for Youth Affaires.She's 22 yrs old, with Masters' from Oxford, and BSc from NYU https://t.co/cRq3bG5krT
Shamma will head the Youth Council to represent the hopes of our youth. She will be empowered and expected to deliver tangible results.
Here is the 12th UAE Cabinet. This is the team which will achieve our nation's aspirations https://t.co/aHgBWBa556
